title: How to Make an Eden Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill the cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes.
Measure and pour the pisco brandy, apricot liqueur, orange juice, and lime juice into the cocktail shaker.
Place the lid on the shaker and shake well.
Add crushed ice to your cocktail glass.
Strain the shaker's contents into the cocktail glass.
Enjoy your drink with a straw.

text: Fill the cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes.  Measure and pour the pisco brandy, apricot liqueur, orange juice, and lime juice into the cocktail shaker.  Place the lid on the shaker and shake well.  Add crushed ice to your cocktail glass.  Strain the shaker's contents into the cocktail glass.  Enjoy your drink with a straw.
